full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Alert

#### Background

Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada (ISED) is seeking proposals for a Coaxial Cable Kit through a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC. Vendors eligible to bid for this project have been invited through an invitation list provided by the necessary authorities.

#### Tender Overview

This RFP has been issued for the procurement of a Coaxial Cable Kit which includes nine specific cables as outlined in the Statement of Requirements. The successful bidder will be required to deliver 68 kits in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in this RFP.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation of proposals will be based on the technical compliance of the products offered against the requirements outlined in this RFP and the Statement of Requirements. The bidder must also provide prices for the products offered, with freight charges included.

#### Tender Requirements

* The bidder must submit a proposal that meets all the evaluation criteria.
* The bidder must provide a firm price for the products offered, with freight charges included.
* The bidder must comply with all the requirements outlined in this RFP.
* The bidder must deliver 68 kits of the recommended products by March 15, 2024.

#### Basis of Selection

The lowest priced responsive bid will be recommended for award of a contract. The vendor must meet all the specified requirements, including the requirement to have a manufacturer that is on the Supply Arrangement.

#### Contact Information

Kelly Stauffer
ISED
(613) 990-8812
kelly.stauffer@ised-isde.gc.ca

#### Annex A: Equipment List

The following is the list of recommended products for the Coaxial Cable Kit:

* 1 x 0.5 meters LMR-195-UF cable (BNC to BNC male)
* 3 x 1 meters LMR-195-UF cable (BNC to BNC male)
* 2 x 1 meters LMR-195-UF cable (N Type to N Type male)
* 2 x 2 meters LMR-195-UF cable (N Type to N Type male)
* 1 x 4 meters LMR-400-UF cable (N Type to N Type male)    
Release Date: January 15, 2024
Closing Date: Monday, January 15, 2024 at 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
